p: Occurrence records were derived from our field expeditions, on-line herbarium databases (Global Biodiversity Information Facility Data Portal, GBIF: www.gbif.org; Chinese Virtual Herbarium Data Portal, CVH: www.cvh.org.cn) and published research (see Supplementary Material1). We removed duplicate records and records with obvious errors in their geographic coordinates and thinned records that occurred within the same 1 km pixel so that only one occurrence remained. After pruning and verifying our data, we were left with 1,444 records for ENM spanning 39 to 200 unique locations (Table 1; Supplementary Fig. S6; see Supplementary Material1).
